text: Ahn Jin-hui (born 6 March 1991) is a South Korean ice hockey player currently playing for Anyang Halla of Asia League Ice Hockey. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:South Korean ice hockey right wingers Category:Olympic ice hockey players of South Korea Category:Anyang Halla players
title: Ahn Jin-hui
